com.upsight.android.managedvariables

Interface UpsightManagedVariablesApi


  • public interface UpsightManagedVariablesApi
    The Upsight Managed Variables API.

    • Method Summary

      void registerUserExperienceHandler(UpsightUserExperience.Handler handler)

    • Method Detail

      • registerUserExperienceHandler

        void registerUserExperienceHandler(UpsightUserExperience.Handler handler)
        Registers a UpsightUserExperience.Handler that gets executed when a new user experience bundle arrives. If no custom UpsightUserExperience.Handler implementation is registered, either because this method is never called, or is cleared by passing null, the default implementation will be applied, which always returns true from UpsightUserExperience.Handler.onReceive(), applying every user experience bundle received.

        This method should be called in com.upsight.android.analytics.session.UpsightSessionCallbacks#onStart(UpsightContext) to ensure registration before any user experience bundle is received.

        Parameters:
        handler - The UpsightUserExperience.Handler; or null to clear.

      • fetch

        <T extends UpsightManagedVariable> T fetch(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                         java.lang.String tag)
        Fetches a managed variable synchronously. This call may read from persistent storage and should not be called from the UI thread.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The managed variable type.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The managed variable class.
        tag - The managed variable tag.
        Returns:
        The managed variable; or null if the tag is invalid.

      • fetch

        <T extends UpsightManagedVariable> UpsightSubscription fetch(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                           java.lang.String tag,
                                                           UpsightManagedVariable.Listener<T> listener)
        Fetches a managed variable asynchronously.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The managed variable type.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The managed variable class.
        tag - The managed variable tag.
        listener - The listener to return the managed variable.
        Returns:
        A cancellable subscription that binds the listener to the call.
